name: SCNShadable
desc: Methods for customizing SceneKit's rendering of geometry and materials using Metal or OpenGL shader programs.

items.name: var program: SCNProgram?
items.desc: A program used when rendering the object.

items.name: var shaderModifiers: [SCNShaderModifierEntryPoint : String]?
items.desc: A dictionary of GLSL source code snippets for customizing the shader programs provided by SceneKit.

items.name: func handleBinding(ofSymbol: String, handler: SCNBindingBlock?)
items.desc: Specifies a block to be called before rendering with programs with the specified GLSL uniform variable or attribute name.

items.name: func handleUnbinding(ofSymbol: String, handler: SCNBindingBlock?)
items.desc: Specifies a block to be called after rendering with programs with the specified GLSL uniform variable or attribute name.

items.name: typealias SCNBindingBlock
items.desc: The signature for a block called for binding or unbinding a GLSL symbol in a custom program.

items.name: struct SCNShaderModifierEntryPoint
items.desc: Keys for the shaderModifiers dictionary, each corresponding to an entry point in SceneKitâ€™s shader programs where you can attach a custom GPU shader code snippet.
